description:
Fantastic viewpoints, lakes, show, croaking of frogs at night.
Bring with you: More water for the first 2 days. Batteries or solar charger  for GPS. Warm clothes. Mosquito net and bug spray. Camping mats to avoid being cold.
Dry weather is recommended in some places (Dilly Daily Summit to Bunyzen Lake). No other special equipment is necessary.
directions:
Plateau Blvd - Park your car here
Cypress Mountain - boil your water
Eagle Mountain - boil your water
Lindsay Lake - not so much space for camping, damp and cold in July
Tangled Summit - no water at all
Dilly Daily Summit - local clear water
Buntzen Lake - local clear water
Plateau Blvd - retun back home
title: Plateau Blvd - Dilly Daily Summit
